titles.title: SCAAP Reimbursement Protection Act of 2008
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for compensation to States incarcerating undocumented aliens charged with a felony or 2 or more misdemeanors.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S549-550)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/31/2008--Introduced.
SCAAP Reimbursement Protection Act of 2008 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to compensate states for incarcerating undocumented aliens charged with a felony or two or more misdemeanors.
